name: Not Todo
description: Not To-Do helps you break bad habits by tracking what not to do. Set reminders, log failed habits, and stay focused with daily nudges to improve your discipline.

name: Pet Assistant
description: Pet Assistant is a smart pet care app under construction—designed to track health, reminders, and records. It’s not ready yet, but perfection takes time (and belly rubs).

name: My Portfolio
description: This isn’t just a portfolio—it’s proof of concept. Built with Angular, Dockerized, Kubernetes-orchestrated, and Datadog-watched. Hosted on my own server. No templates. No fluff. Just real engineering.

name: DARC Software
description: DARC Software specializes in scalable, cloud-native web and mobile apps. We architect robust backends, pixel-perfect frontends, and seamless CI/CD pipelines to deliver high-performance solutions for startups and enterprise clients alike.

name: In Progress...
description: This whitelabel mobile app showcases live events, menus, and daily specials across Amelia Island’s top bars, with easy filtering by venue and stage location for a personalized nightlife experience.
